title: Electrical and Optical Properties of Materials
description: Optical properties of and electrical transport in materials; topics may include insulators, semiconductors, metals, superconductors and their applications in photovoltaics, thermoelectrics, and nanocomposites.

title: Materials and Nanosciences Laboratory
description: The laboratory course is aimed at students enrolled in the MNS program and is composed of experiments involving the syntheses of materials and nano-particles; in addition to their characterization and application using modern instrumentation techniques.
requirementsDescription: Prereq: Materials and Nanosciences students only; Coreq: MNS 211 or 221
